name: Roll Roll Ball!
description:
Roll Roll Ball rules are simple! Just roll the ball into the hole!
But there are a lot of gimmicks that keep the ball from moving forward, so it won't be easy to clear.

Many gimmicks are waiting for you.
Let's aim to clear all Level by rotating your head fully!

*How to play
・Tap to drop the ball off the launch pad.
・It is important to identify gimmicks and timing.
・It will be clear if you put the ball in the hole.
・If you collect three stars, you will get the highest rating.
